function.name: colorMode_setValue
function.description: This function sets the color mode of a SmartThings device. The color modes include sleep, relaxing, reading modes, etc.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the color mode for.

mode.description: The specific color mode to set the device to (e.g., sleep, relaxing, reading).

groupAction.description: Whether the action should be applied to a group of devices.
